page1.title: Buckasura
page1.description: Arya, an advocate by profession, would take up any case or client. All he cares about is the money and he would go to any extent. A series of events on one of Arya's ongoing cases, however, alter his destiny and changes his view towards life.

page1.title: Katheyondu Shuruvagide
page1.description: A young resort owner goes through a tough time.

page1.title: Kataka
page1.description: A nuclear family with a single child arrives in a village where the husband plans to set up a school. The child begins to behave strangely. A horror thriller true story backed by Puneeth Rajkumar!!

page1.title: Vaasu Naan Pakka Commercial
page1.description: Vaasu, a young man falls head over heels in love with Mahalakshmi. However, little does he know that his actions will have adverse repercussions on his family.

page1.title: Gultoo
page1.description: Two aspiring entrepreneurs become entangled in a cyber crime.

page1.title: Kulfi
page1.description: A young and attractive girl entices three men to accompany her to an estate home. However, unbeknownst to the men, the girl is a psychopath, suffering from schizotypal personality disorder and plots to murder them.

page2.title: Tagaru
page2.description: Tagaru takes us on a bloody ride through the dark underbelly of the underworld and their clash against the police. A super- hit action blockbuster!!

page2.title: Aa Karaala Ratri
page2.description: In an interior village deep in Karnataka, a fortune teller visits a poverty-stricken family and tells them that their fortune is going to change overnight. Based on a play by Mohan Habbu which was based on the Russian story titled The Return of the Soldier.

page2.title: Raambo 2
page2.description: Disillusioned with his monotonous routine, a young man decides to treat himself to a "day of adventure."

page2.title: Veera Ranachandi
page2.description: Nandini, a gangster whoâ€™s nearly killed in a fight with a rival gang, ends up in a village where an aged couple believes she is their long-lost daughter.

page2.title: Kanaka
page2.description: Kanaka is an auto driver and a big fan of Dr Rajkumar. He lives in the city away from his family in Bankapura, where he ran away from as a child. An incident in Bengaluru makes him go back to his hometown. Does he have a happy reunion?

page2.title: Humble Politician Nograj
page2.description: The film tells the story of Nograj, a narcissistic crazy politician who exploits a city and its resources.

page3.title: School Master
page3.description: A teacher moves with his family to a new place and is astonished to see the poor state of the local school. There, he meets a student who, as time passes, changes his life forever. First Kannada film to complete the Silver Jubilee Celebration!!

page3.title: Raj Vishnu
page3.description: Raj Vishnu is the story of a young and unemployed person who fulfills his grandfather's wishes with the help of his friend and how he succeeds in love.

page3.title: Kirik Party
page3.description: The film is about Karna, played by Rakshit. It traces his life through his years in the college. One of the highest grossing Kannada film all time!!

page3.title: Eradane Sala
page3.description: When a mother has taken an oath from her son that he won't fall in love or look 'differently' at their new female house guest, forbidden fruit seems sweeter. A rom-com with a twist!!

page3.title: Chigurida Kanasu
page3.description: Shankar, a city lad, pays a visit to his ancestral village. When he decides to settle there for good, he faces opposition from his own family and from a village bigwig. A critically acclaimed movie based on a novel by the same name.

page3.title: Operation Alamelamma
page3.description: Purmy, a vegetable auctioneer, who is engaged to be married to a school teacher, is picked up by the police. He has been rounded in as the prime suspect in the kidnap case of a school kid. How does Purmy wriggle out of this mess?

page4.title: Chakravyuha
page4.description: Based on director's own Tamil movie Ivan Veramathiri, it tells the story of a hero's fight for a noble cause. An action blockbuster!!

page4.title: Hebbuli
page4.description: Hebbuli stars Sudeep in the role of a paramilitary commando and is a story about the life of a military man. An action blockbuster!!

page4.title: Cinema My Darling
page4.description: Four aspirants, an actor, a director, a music composer and a cinematographer, live together, harboring dreams of striking gold in Gandhinagar. They battle fate and egos and finally land their first break. Does it go as planned?

page4.title: Saheba
page4.description: The lives of a prodigal genius, Mano, and an innocent girl, Nandini, cross paths despite them having two completely different approaches towards life. Will the two choose to go the same path or does fate have other plans for them?

page4.title: Mercury
page4.description: Five friends, all affected in some way by a mercury poisoning incident are partying when a freak accident put them on a collision course with an entity that is in no mood to forgive their misgivings. A sound film which lacks dialogues!!

page4.title: Dhairyam
page4.description: Krishna Ajai is a student from a lower-middle-class family, who struggles to make two ends meet. When he is subjected to tough situations that involve him needing money for his family and love, he embarks on a risky mission. Does he succeed?

page5.title: Hombanna
page5.description: The main theme of the movie is around the pros and cons of the encroachment of forest land by the poor farmers.

page5.title: Jana Gana Mana
page5.description: Jhansi is a young and ambitious IPS officer and she takes on a case that requires her to interrogate and fight one of the most dreaded criminals in Madikeri. An action-drama!!

page5.title: College Kumar
page5.description: A father is hell-bent on ensuring that his son fulfills his own dream of a career as an officer. A coming of age story about a happy go lucky young lad.

page5.title: Keralida Simha
page5.description: The film revolves around two brothers who are police officers. The protagonist falls in love with a lawyer played by Saritha. The protagonist seizes a gang which involves the consumption of illegal drugs. A classic musical action drama!!

page5.title: Mr. Perfect
page5.description: Anup sleepwalks and it turns out to be a blessing in disguise for Sreeja.Meanwhile, there is a haunted factory with a woman's spirit.A horror thriller!!

page5.title: Toss
page5.description: Sandeep and Madhav are inseparable buddies since high school. When they fall in love with the same girl, they plan on flipping a coin to decide who would propose to her.

page6.title: Tarak
page6.description: Tarak, a pragmatic do-gooder, falls in love with Meera, a selfless romantic who lives for the happiness of others just like what her name alludes to. When she challenges him to test their love, do they emerge victoriously?

page6.title: Chamak
page6.description: Dr. Kush â€“ a gynecologist finally agreeing with the family members marries Kushi. Both after marriage give â€˜Chamakâ€™ â€“ they reach out to parties and fly in intoxication â€“ the liberty of life both do not want to give up.

page6.title: Vaira
page6.description: As part of his assignment, a fashion photographer travels to Madikeri, where he meets a local girl, Priyanka, and falls in love with her. However, during his stay at Madikeri, he encounters a series of supernatural incidents.

page6.title: Aake
page6.description: Arjun is an artist, who works in London and is working on illustrations on a book about a real story of a ghost named Maya.A remake of the 2015 Tamil movie Maya.

page6.title: Tora Tora
page6.description: A bunch of youngsters in a college's movie club experiences an unusual day that ends with them spoiling the remote control of their air conditioner.

page6.title: Kireeta
page6.description: Following the life of a young boy, Kireeta is a love story, which also throws light on the parameters required for a person to be successful in the society - love, power, fame, and money.

page7.title: Akira
page7.description: The film revolves around Akira, who is reminiscing his life, his trysts with love and how he turned out to be the responsible man that his businessman father he eventually wanted to be.

page7.title: Bharjari
page7.description: A romantic action drama about the life of an easygoing youngster named Surya, whose life takes some unexpected turns thanks to the three women he meets along the way.

page7.title: Maasti Gudi
page7.description: The movie sheds light on the poaching activities that took place in the BRT forest range in the 90s. Actors Anil Kumar and Raghava Uday drowned when they took a 60-feet plunge from a chopper while shooting film's climax.

page7.title: Dandupalya 2
page7.description: The dreaded Dandupalya gang is behind bars and are all set to face their death sentence. A sequel to 2012 thriller â€˜Dandupalyaâ€™ that chronicled the life and exploitations of the scandalous D-gang. *MATURE CONTENT*

page7.title: Urvi
page7.description: Asha is a medical student, full of hope, like her name. On the other side there is romantic Suzie and courageous Daisy who work in Bobby's brothel. When fate makes their paths meet, will their dreams still remain alive?

page7.title: Vishnuvardhana
page7.description: A man who has a dream of making easy money falls in a series of complex situations when he accidentally finds a gangster's phone.The movie was remade in Bengali as Bachchan

page8.title: My Autograph
page8.description: A man who is about to get married visits three women who he had been in love with at different points in his life.This film is a remake of Tamil film Autograph.

page8.title: Sandalwood Sa Ri Ga Ma
page8.description: 'Sandalwood Sa Ri Ga Ma' is based on the story of a person who quits his job to join the Kannada film industry as a director.

page8.title: Nenapirali
page8.description: Nenapirali is a 2005 Indian Kannada language film directed by Ratnaja. It stars Prem Kumar, Vidhya Venkatesh, and Varsha in the lead roles. The film was a blockbuster and won many FilmFare Awards.

page8.title: Nanda Loves Nanditha
page8.description: Nanda Loves Nanditha is a 2008 Indian Kannada language film directed by B. N. Vijayakumar starring Yogesh and Nandita in the lead roles.

page8.title: Mata
page8.description: Mata is a black comedy. The movie primarily revolves around the events that occur within a contemporary matha/mutts, which are revered as one of the most sacred institutions in India.

page8.title: Mareyalaare
page8.description: An ad film director meets a woman in Chikmagalur when he is there on a location hunt. He falls in love with both her and her writing. He convinces her to write a book, which ends up being published in his name. What happens then?

page9.title: Rama Shama Bhama
page9.description: A remake of the 1995 Tamil film, Sathi Leelavathi.The film revolves around a married cartoonist Rama who has an affair with Priya. When she finds out about his personal life, she still continuously pursues him.

page9.title: Killing Veerappan
page9.description: A master strategist is appointed following Veerappan's unabashed spate of crimes and murders. The official puts in place Operation Cocoon, which involves setting up a network of spies and informers.

page9.title: Kempe Gowda
page9.description: A powerful gangster (Ravishankar) plots revenge against an honest cop (Kiccha Sudeepa).A remake of the Tamil superhit film Singam !!

page9.title: Ulidavaru Kandanthe
page9.description: A journalist sets out to uncover the truth behind an incident, through the perspectives of different people, unraveling how they and their lives are intertwined with it.The film has been remade in Tamil starring Nivin Pauly as Richie.

page9.title: Gulabi Talkies
page9.description: Gulabi is a discarded fifty-something woman, an outcast living on an island with the fisherfolk. Her obsession with films is full filled with the introduction of a television in her life and her village hut becomes a hub.

page9.title: Godhi Banna Sadharana Mykattu
page9.description: The film revolves around Venkob Rao, a middle-aged man who suffers from Alzheimer's disease, going missing. His son Shiva who is worried by his father's disappearance embarks on a search with a female doctor.

page10.title: Bahaddur
page10.description: Ashok, who belongs to the royal Bahaddur family, falls for Anjali, a charming girl. But, his task of wooing her becomes tough when Anjali's father fixes her engagement with another boy.

page10.title: Addhuri
page10.description: The story revolves around two characters named Arjun and Poorna. Arjun meets Poorna and instantly falls for her. Poorna is in no mood to follow suit. She has her own confusions and does not want to commit her love for Arjun.

page10.title: Jogayya
page10.description: Jogayya, the 100th film of Shivarajkumar, tells the story of Madesha alias Jogi after his mother's death.Jogi decides to cut off ties with the underworld and leaves for Mumbai.It is the sequel to the 2005 blockbuster film Jogi.

page10.title: Ondu Motteya Kathe
page10.description: Ondu Motteya Kathe (EGGHEAD) is simple tale of a young bald man trying to find his soulmate, who would see the person he is and not the shine up his forehead.

page10.title: Kahi
page10.description: A series of events unfold in modern day Bengaluru, intertwining four different lives: a dancer, a drug peddler, a writer and a psychopath.

page10.title: Pataki
page10.description: Surya, a corrupt IPS officer abuses his power and resorts to illegal means to gain monetary benefits. He also joins hands with a local MP named Rudra Pratap, which infuriates Agni, the DGP of Karnataka. Remake of Telugu Move Pataas.

page11.title: Kotigobba 2
page11.description: A real estate agent (Sudeep), who moonlights as a robber, becomes the target of a corrupt cop (Sai Ravi) who is determined to bring him to justice. In tamil it is as Mudinja Ivana Pudi. Despite its title, the film is NOT a sequel to Kotigobba (2001).

page11.title: Rama Rama Re
page11.description: It is a simple story of a convict on death row, who escapes from prison and accidentally ends up with a veteran who is called upon by the authorities to teach the process of hanging a convict to the new staff.

page11.title: Jessie
page11.description: Jessie is a love story which revolves around three persons.How will Jessie get his Love or will he sacrifice when caste and religion comes between them is the theme.

page11.title: Dhana pisachi
page11.description: A greedy man undergoes a lot of trouble for money, not caring how many lives he puts in trouble

page11.title: Anuraga Aralithu
page11.description: The movie's protagonist lives by high moral standards. By circumstance, he is forced to marry the lady owner of the factory where he works. He tolerates her boorish behavior to keep his aged mother happy, later he decides to teach his wife a lesson.

page11.title: Kurmavatara
page11.description: The story revolves around a government employee cast in a play to portray Mahatma Gandhi, who, on course, realizes that playing Gandhi is easier than imbibing and implementing his principles in real-life.

page12.title: Bandhana
page12.description: The story is about a doctor, Harish, who falls in love with his student Nandini. Harish tries to express his feelings to her but fails to do so. When he finally musters the courage to tell her that he loves her, she tells him that her marriage is fixed to Balu.

page12.title: Madamakki
page12.description: Madamakki is an action-thriller film. The story starts with Shankar (Sai Kumar) telling the story of Saadhu`s journey that begins from Mumbai and ends in Madamakki.

page12.title: Ellindalo Bandavaru
page12.description: Ellindalo Bandavaru is a 1980 Indian Kannada film, directed by P. Lankesh and produced by Navashakthi. The film stars Vimala Naidu, Suresh Heblikar, Lokesh and Meena Kuttappa in lead roles. The film had musical score by Vijaya Bhaskar.

page12.title: Bhale Adrushtavo Adrushta
page12.description: A poor novel writer falls in love with a poor girl. A 1971 Kannada film, directed by K. S. L. Swamy. The film stars Kalpana, B. V. Radha, Gangadhar and Srinath in lead roles. The film had musical score by Vijaya Bhaskar.

page12.title: Varadhanayaka
page12.description: A remake of Telugu film Lakshyam.Hari and Siri are in love. Hari's elder brother, Varadanayaka is a tough man and an honest police officer. Will his work and the enemies he makes, especially Section Shankar, impact the lives of his family?

page12.title: Mayabazar (Kannada)
page12.description: The story revolves around the characters in the Hindu Epic "The Mahabharata" and is set in Dwaraka, the hometown of Lord Krishna.[Kannada Dubbed Version of 1957 Telugu Movie Mayabazar Black & White Print]

page13.title: Parapancha
page13.description: Rajeeva rebels against his father`s wrongdoings and leaves home, leaving everything earned by his father. Rajeeva happens to meet a nomad Khaali Peeli and gets him a server`s job in the family bar and restaurant `Parapancha`.

page13.title: Masterpiece
page13.description: Yash plays a street smart negative character in the film while Suhasini plays his mother, who disapproves of everything her son does. The film has shades of patriotism.

page13.title: Kalpana 2
page13.description: Raghava has Nyctophobia. Raghava, who loves Nandhini, is a cinematographer for a TV channel and wants to shoot a fake haunted house, in order to increase TRP ratings. To their misfortune, they are haunted, not by one but by five ghosts.

page13.title: Sangama
page13.description: Lachchi falls in love with her neighbour, Balu, while her parents are searching for a suitable bridegroom. But, Balu believes that the respect of people is more important than love.

page13.title: Shiva
page13.description: The film depicts an incident involving Shiva's father who is a jockey. He is dubbed a cheater and his honest, journalist friend sets out to expose the truth.An Action Drama!!

page13.title: Sanju Weds Geetha
page13.description: Sanju Weds Geetha begins with Sanju graduating in computer science with top marks, immediately after which he leaves to his native, Kodagu. There he meets Geetha who is seen helping a beggar on the street, and he is instantly infatuated.

page14.title: Rana Vikrama
page14.description: Vikram nurses the ambition of donning the khaki uniform. The young man is chosen by the home minister for an important mission. He's sent to a remote place called Vikramatheertha  to probe a reporter's death.

page14.title: Gaalipata
page14.description: A suitor has to woo a beautiful young widow in a very special way. Ganesh falls in love with Sowmya a widow living with her in-laws. Ganeshâ€™s friends Kitti and Diganth fall for the familyâ€™s two daughters.

page14.title: Abachurina Post Office
page14.description: Abachurina Post Office is a 1973 Indian Kannada language drama film directed by N. Lakshminarayan, based on a short story of the same name written by Poornachandra Tejaswi.

page14.title: Priyanka
page14.description: Priyanka is a happily married wife, until she encounters a youngster who falls for her and he decides to make his presence felt. Will she fall prey to this stalker?A thriller inspired by real events that happened n Bangalore in 2014.

page14.title: Mungaru Male 2
page14.description: Preetham is the only son of millionaire Suryakanth and is very impulsive. Preetham searches for excitement in everything he does and gets bored too easily, even in relationships.

page14.title: Karvva
page14.description: It is a two-dimensional story, one trying to unveil an age old unknown mystery, and another experiencing the existence of the unknown. Do these stories meet? What happens to the fate of those involved with the unknown?

page15.title: Last Bus
page15.description: 6 passengers board the last bus, anxious to reach their destination. But fate has other plans for them. Shock, anxiety, deceit, anger, frustration, fear takes over this unexpected journey that twists and turns into a nightmare.

page15.title: Ugramm
page15.description: An Indian girl who lives in Australia comes back to Karnataka to visit her mother`s grave. This is when she finds trouble and story of Ugramm begins.Ugramm is a Sanskrit word and it means Momentous Anger-Induced by a Great Period of Tolerance.

page15.title: Simple Agi Ondh Love Story
page15.description: Kushal is sent by his radio jockey sister Rachana to Kodagu to meet her boyfriend's sister, Ithihasini, in the hope that the two will take a liking to each other, leading to marriage, and thus be paving the way for her own marriage.

page15.title: Milana
page15.description: A girl marries a man because of family pressure and asks for a divorce on their first night. He readily agrees and reunites her with her lost lover but later gathers that he is a fraud. Even she learns the truth but still sign the divorce papers.

page15.title: Hasina
page15.description: Hasina marries auto driver Yakub against his mother's wishes. The couple has 3 daughters  Munni, Shubby and Habeeb. Pregnant with their fourth child, the couple break social codes and do a pregnancy scan to ascertain the baby's gender.

page15.title: Bhoodaana
page15.description: The movie starred Rajkumar, Kalyan Kumar and Udaykumar- all 3 in full-fledge roles in single movie for the only time in their career. The theme of the movie was based on Vinoba Bhave's Bhoodan movement.

page17.title: Thithi
page17.description: In a remote village in South India, 3 generations of sons react to the death of their grandfather, a 101-year-old man. The 3 story lines intertwine before converging at Century Gowda's "Thithi", the final funeral celebration 11 days after a death.

page17.title: Zoom
page17.description: Santhosh and Naina are advertising professionals. While Santhosh gets offers for his company through smart work and shortcuts, Naina believes hard work gets everything. An altercation leads to the two ending up rivals.

page17.title: Yuga Purusha
page17.description: The movie is about reincarnation where a man is murdered by his newly wedded wife in his past life for the sake of acquiring the man's property. After taking a new birth, the man takes revenge against his past life's wife

page17.title: Mommaga
page17.description: Mommaga is a 1997 Indian Kannada language romantic drama film directed by V. Ravichandran and produced by Sandesh Nagaraj.

page17.title: Bachchan
page17.description: A kind-hearted businessman, who is in love with a girl, sets out to exact revenge on the people responsible for disrupting his life.

page17.title: Veera Parampare
page17.description: A criminal hatches a plan to kill a farmer, take over the land and hand it to industrialists. But a young man, whose father died while serving the farmer, steps in to take the responsibility of protecting him.

page18.title: Vamsha Vriksha
page18.description: Vamsha Vriksha, is a 1972 Indian Kannada-language film directed by B. V. Karanth and Girish Karnad, based on S. L. Bhyrappa's novel of the same name. The film won the National Film Awards for Best Direction.

page18.title: Dr. B. R. Ambedkar
page18.description: The film is about the Father of the Indian Constitution -- Bhim Rao Ambedkar and his dedication to creating a classless society.

page18.title: Arasu (Kannada)
page18.description: Shivaraj Aras is an NRI who is contented with spending his father's money. He is advised to return to India by his manager to run the well-progressing companies he heads. Once in India, Aras finds it hard to adjust to the mediocre life led by people.

page18.title: U Turn
page18.description: The story revolves around a young journalist who finds herself entangled in a murder while working on a story on traffic rule breakers.

page18.title: Adyaksha
page18.description: A remake of Tamil movie Tamil film â€˜Vadathapadar Vallibar Sanghamâ€™.A daughter rebels against the marriage her father arranges for her and instead runs off with a gang member.

page18.title: Bhakta Kanakadasa
page18.description: Bhakta Kanakadasa is a 1960 Indian Kannada language film directed by Y. R. Swamy. It depicts the spiritual journey of Kanakadasa was a devotee of the Hindu deity Krishna, and a poet belonging to the Dasa sect.

page19.title: Lucky
page19.description: Lucky is constantly trying to get the attention of Gowri as he is in love with her. One day, Lucky gets an interview call for an ad company and he discovers that Gowri is in the same office.

page19.title: Mukhaputa
page19.description: The film is set in a small town in South India, where a socially responsible educationally oriented traditional woman adopts a young baby girl and realizes after several years that the child had HIV at birth.

page19.title: Sainika
page19.description: Subedar Surya, a military major, returns home to his family.The entire family is aware that Surya is in love with his childhood sweetheart Gauri and arrange their engagement. After the engagement Gauri father Virendra asks Surya to quit the army.

page19.title: Maathaad Maathaadu Mallige
page19.description: How a villager Hoovaiah, takes on an MNC and corrupt politicians who try to misguide villagers to acquire a village for mining? A must-see film!!

page19.title: Tabbaliyu Neenade Magane
page19.description: A 1977  Kannad film directed by Girish Karnad and B. V. Karanth, with Nasiruddin Shah, Lakshmi Krishnamurthy in pivotal roles. The film is based on S. L. Bhyrappa's Kannada novel of the same name. The Hindi version of the film was called Godhul.

page19.title: Bhakta Prahlada
page19.description: Bhakta Prahlada is a 1983 Kannada mythological film directed by Vijay. The film stars Rajkumar, Saritha, Master Lohith and Ananth Nag in lead roles.The film was based on Hindu mythological tale of Prahlada.

page20.title: Bahaddur Gandu
page20.description: Bahaddur Gandu, is a 1976 Indian Kannada language feature film directed by A. V. Sheshagiri Rao, starring Rajkumar, Jayanthi, Aarathi and Vajramuni in lead roles. The film was inspired by Dilip Kumar starrer Aan.

page20.title: Chirru
page20.description: ''Chirru'' is a story revolving around friendship. It is a visual treat to the viewers that endeavors to capture the existence of friendship over love.

page20.title: Mr. Airavata
page20.description: A common farmer turns into an IAS police officer to help the poor and fight against corruption and finally taking the revenge of his murdered sister.

page20.title: Khushi Khushiyagi
page20.description: The movie deals with the confusion and the hilarious circumstances associated with mistaken identity, with romance being the underlying theme

page20.title: Lucia (2013)
page20.description: A man suffering from insomnia is tricked into buying a drug, Lucia, that makes his desires come true in his dreams, blurring the line between fantasy and reality.

page20.title: Lucia
page20.description: A man suffering from insomnia is tricked into buying a drug, Lucia, that makes his desires come true in his dreams, blurring the line between fantasy and reality.

page21.title: Mavana Magalu
page21.description: Mavana Magalu is a 1965 Indian Kannada film, directed by S K A Chari and produced by A V Subba Rao. The film stars Jayalalithaa, Kalyan Kumar, K. S. Ashwath and T. N. Balakrishna in lead roles. The film had musical score by T. Chalapathi Rao.

page21.title: Mane Aliya
page21.description: Mane Aliya is a 1964 Indian Kannada film, directed by S K A Chari and produced by A V Subba Rao. The film stars Kalyan Kumar, Jayalalithaa, K. S. Ashwath and Balakrishna in lead roles. The film had musical score by T. Chalapathi Rao.

page21.title: Guru Shishyaru
page21.description: Guru Shishyaru is a 1981 Indian Kannada comedy film directed by H.R. Bhargava and produced by Dwarakish under his "Dwarkish Chitra" production house.

page21.title: Tiger Gangu
page21.description: A 1990 Kannada Action movie by Sundarnath Suvarna starring: Tiger Prabhakar, Pavithra, M Leelavathi.

page21.title: Manasare
page21.description: The main thrust of the movie is to show the hypocrisy of a society which classifies behaviors, and, by extension, people into 'normal' and 'abnormal'.

page21.title: Alemari
page21.description: This is the story of wanderer dreaming about his love. The film unfolding in the flashback is the story of Mohan who is hit badly in life by the underworld. The swollen face, the hunch back is the consequence of his opposition to the underworld.

page22.title: Tiger Gangu
page22.description: A 1990 Kannada Action movie by Sundarnath Suvarna starring: Tiger Prabhakar, Pavithra, M Leelavathi.

page22.title: Zabardusth
page22.description: A 2005 Kannada Drama movie by Ram Bharathan Devan starring: Bhushan Kumar, Rashmi Kulkarni, B C Patil

page22.title: Nayana
page22.description: This short film venture is from an IT professional who worked only during weekends and achieve in completing short film of duration over half an hour.

page22.title: Achchu Mechchu
page22.description: It revolves around a young son's wants to get his mother married to a professor as per his late father's wish.

page22.title: Mavana Magalu
page22.description: Mavana Magalu is a 1965 Indian Kannada film, directed by S K A Chari and produced by A V Subba Rao. The film stars Jayalalithaa, Kalyan Kumar, K. S. Ashwath and T. N. Balakrishna in lead roles. The film had musical score by T. Chalapathi Rao.

page22.title: Bangaarada Manushya
page22.description: Rajeeva comes to the village to visit his sister only to find that she's in financial trouble and has lost her husband. He decides to stay and help her out.

page23.title: Lucia
page23.description: A man suffering from insomnia is tricked into buying a drug, Lucia, that makes his desires come true in his dreams, blurring the line between fantasy and reality.

page23.title: Nanjundi Kalyana
page23.description: Nanjundi Kalyana is a 1989 Indian Kannada romantic comedy film directed by M. S. Rajashekar and starring newcomers Raghavendra Rajkumar and Malashri, with Girija Lokesh and Sunder Krishna Urs as the lead cast.

page23.title: Manthralaya Mahathme
page23.description: Mantralaya Mahatme is a 1966 Indian Kannada film directed by T. V. Singh Thakur, based on Sri Raghavendra Vijaya written by Rajaguru Rajacharya, and stars Rajkumar in the role of Raghavendra Swami, a Hindu saint who lived in the 17th century India.

page23.title: Alemari
page23.description: This is the story of wanderer dreaming about his love. The film unfolding in the flashback is the story of Mohan who is hit badly in life by the underworld. The swollen face, the hunch back is the consequence of his opposition to the underworld.

page23.title: Manikantana Mahime
page23.description: Manikantana Mahime is a 1993 Indian Kannada film, directed by K. Shankar and produced by V Swaminathan. The film stars Vishnuvardhan, Sarath Babu, Sreekanth and Srinivasa Murthy in lead roles.

page23.title: Manasare
page23.description: The main thrust of the movie is to show the hypocrisy of a society which classifies behaviors, and, by extension, people into 'normal' and 'abnormal'.

page24.title: Satya In Love
page24.description: Satya (Shivraj) goes in pursuit of his love, Veda (Genelia), and is severely punished for his exertions. All this surprises Veda, who has never set eyes on Satya before! Will Satyaâ€™s dogged love overcome familial and societal obstacles?

page24.title: Bangaarada Panjara
page24.description: Bangaarada Panjara is a 1974 Indian Kannada comedy film directed by V. Somashekhar and starring Rajkumar in the lead role. The supporting cast features Aarathi, K. S. Ashwath, Pandari Bai and Lokanath.

page24.title: Sivaji 2015
page24.description: A DVD film on corruption by Arjun Subramanya as director and actor. It is a fight on corruption shot in 21 days in Coorg and Madikeri.

page24.title: Poorvapara
page24.description: Poorvapara deals with the emotions of parents staying in India and son staying several thousand miles away from homeland! Poorvapara literally means 'antecedent and subsequent'.It also means Eastern and Western.

page24.title: Police Story 2
page24.description: Agni (Saikumar) and Vijay (Rockline Venkatesh) are the loyal cops. They face stiff opposition from Godmother Kempamma (Sana) in their objective of a crime free city.

page24.title: Simhadriya Simha
page24.description: A remake of the 1994 Tamil film Nattamai.The story revolves around Narasimhe Gowda, who is the chieftain for a group of 48 villages. He is the man with the strength of an elephant and who rules the Simhadri village as a lion rules his kingdom.

page25.title: Shreeram
page25.description: Shivu is a young boy well known for his caring nature towards his family. He falls in love with Annya. After taking approval for their relationship from both the families, Shivu and Annya are about to tie the knot.But some twist in the story happens!!

page25.title: Shankar IPS
page25.description: The film deals with the social issues such as acid attacks on women, plight of women call centers employees and others.Shankar Prasad is a tough police officer on a mission to eradicate all the social evils around him.

page25.title: Shabdavedhi
page25.description: Shabdwivedi is about Sandeep, a strict police officer crusading against narcotics. The man is so straight that when his wife Jaya Prada refuses to reveal the identity of a key link in the drug ring that he is investigating, he beats her in lockup.

page25.title: Sathyavan Savithri
page25.description: The film is all about the hilarious incidents that happen in a dentist Sathyavan's life who is a big time flirt and never believes in marriage. His grandfather tells him to get married otherwise all his wealth will be donated to the charitable trust.

page25.title: Sankalpa
page25.description: A 1973 Kannada Drama movie by P V Nanjaraja Urs starring: Ananth Nag, C R Simha, Bindu Jayadev.

page25.title: Mr. And Mrs. Ramachari
page25.description: The movie is about a hot-headed guy Ramachari, who becomes a fan of Vishnuvardhan's Ramachari from Nagarahaavu after seeing the same consequences they went through.

page26.title: Rajakumari
page26.description: A remake of Tamil film Anantha Poongatre (1999).Raja is waiting since four years to get the nod from Kumari who is with a child pretending as a widow. It is herself inflicted punishment for the wrong move of her father, Zamindar of the village.

page26.title: Rajadhani
page26.description: Five aimless youths are offered money to assassinate a local gangster. This is the beginning of their downward spiral into a life of crime.

page26.title: Police Quarters
page26.description: When Dharma dies suddenly, his fast friend and colleague Avinash finds his widow a job in the police department. Dharmaâ€™s son, grows up and saves Avinashâ€™s daughter Sonu during a communal riot.

page26.title: Payana
page26.description: Payana is a Kannada drama movie, directed by Kiran Govi. The cast of Payana includes Ravishankar Gowda,Ramanithu Chaudhary.

page26.title: Ninagagi Kadiruve
page26.description: Nandan and Shweta are intensely in love. Their good friend Vishwas helps them to get married. However, a chance incident changes the story upside down and Vishwas becomes the sole cause for a major trouble in the lives of Nandan and Shweta.

page26.title: Neelakanta
page26.description: A remake of Tamil film Aranmanai Kili (1993).Neelakanta's mother disagrees with his accidental marriage and asks him not to see her face. On the other hand, his wife on compulsion suspects Neelanakanta to the extreme.

page27.title: Namma Basava
page27.description: Basava runs a gym center and lives with his brother Avinash and Sudharani, who treat him as their own son. He is permanently opposed by competitors. When his brother starts seeking a girl as his bride, he opines that he should select his future bride.

page27.title: Moggina Jade
page27.description: Moggina Jade focuses on the emotional ripple effect caused by urbanization and outsourcing.Priya, the girl child is forbidden by her mother to braid her hair. Rekha, the girl's mother works for an outsourcing firm and is interested in partying.

page27.title: Malla
page27.description: Malla (Ravichandran)  is soft natured person.But his son Shiva (Ravichandran) is opposite. Father sacrifices his life for his son.

page27.title: Majestic
page27.description: Orphaned out of circumstances the young boy grows under the shadow of corrupt and careless cops. He gets the name of â€˜Dasaâ€™. After fifteen years he is the highly respected goonda element in the society.

page27.title: Kutumba
page27.description: Though he would put family first, a man lets himself be used by criminals as their puppet.A remake of the 1991 Tollywood film Gang Leader

page27.title: Krishnan Marriage Story
page27.description: A man hailing from a joint family that consists of more than a dozen people visits his grandmother's home and falls in love with his childhood friend.

page28.title: Krishnan Love Story
page28.description: It's saga of a girl born in a poor family who is forced to suppress her ambitions for want of money. Her romantic life makes her face some embarrassing situations.

page28.title: Kencha
page28.description: The story is about a college student Rahul, who likes taking up challenges in life. During a motorbike racing competition, he sees a person getting killed by Pashupathi, a dreaded don in the city who has been hired by Giri Gowda, a minister.

page28.title: Katari Veera Surasundarangi
page28.description: A sequel to Upendra's 2003 film Raktha Kanneeru.Upendra reprises his role of the highly educated rich man turned beggar Mohan now in hell, who meets his look-alike gangster son (Upendra again) who is killed in a gang war.

page28.title: Kariya
page28.description: The Movie directed by Prem as his debut him. This film was released two times and became hit both times. Darshan played the role of Gangster who falls in love with Abhi, Dancer.

page28.title: Kanasugara (2001)
page28.description: A remake of Tamil blockbuster film Unnidathil Ennai Koduthen (1998).Indian Kannada language romance-drama film starring V. Ravichandran, Prema and Shashikumar in the lead roles

page28.title: Junglee
page28.description: Junglee is a 2009 Indian Kannada language romantic action movie directed by Soori and produced by Rockline Venkatesh

page29.title: Jarasandha
page29.description: Krishamurthy alias Kitty is a gym trainer and lives with his mother. He wants to win the Mr. India title. Meanwhile, Samantha comes in between and falls for Kitty. But Kitty has a secret that he must keep.

page29.title: Hoo
page29.description: This film is a remake of Telugu hit movie Vasantham and Tamil film Priyamana Thozhi released in 2003.

page29.title: Gokarna  (2003)
page29.description: Gokarna is a 2003 Kannada film starring Superstar Upendra and Rakshita.The film is about the friendship between two men who split up-turn enemies and then become friends again.

page29.title: Suprabhatha
page29.description: Suprabhatha is a 1988 Indian Kannada language romantic drama film directed and written by Dinesh Babu making his first entry as a director. The film starred Vishnuvardhan, Suhasini and Srividya in the lead roles.

page29.title: Eradane Maduve
page29.description: The film revolves around the conflicts between a working wife and an unemployed husband who loses his job for being wrongly implicated in a Lokyukta raid and the disadvantage taken by their kin out of this situation to satisfy their selfish purpose.

page29.title: Devru
page29.description: Devru is the remake of tamil movie Thalai Nagaram. Vijay and Pragnya are in lead roles. Rockline Venkatesh plays the role of police officer.

page32.title: Aptharakshaka
page32.description: An ancient painting of Nagavalli creates chaos in the household of a bharathanatyam dancer, Saraswathi.Acharya Ramchandra Shastry and Dr. Vijay, a psychiatrist, get together to solve the mystery behind the events.

page32.title: Anubhava
page32.description: Anubhava is a 1984 Indian Kannada-language adult drama starring Kashinath and Abhinaya in the lead roles. Actresses Abhinaya and Umashree made their debut with this film.

page32.title: Aham Premasmi
page32.description: Aham Premasmi is a 2005 Indian Kannada-language romantic film directed by V. Ravichandran.

page32.title: Accident
page32.description: The movie is a contemporary take on the life of a couple and their journey through time and how they have to fight the eternal battle of good over evil and how they win with support from a set of dear friends.

page32.title: Abhi
page32.description: Abhi is a cool guy who is good at cultural activities. Bhanu's family approaches Abhi's Family in search of a rental house. In the beginning, there is hatred between Abhi and Bhanu, but then they start to know each other.

page32.title: Aa Dinagalu
page32.description: Based on the non-fictional novel "Dadagiri Dinagalu", an affluent youth is dragged into the 1980s Bangalore underworld to save his love from his conspiring father.

page33.title: Pallavi
page33.description: A 1976 Kannada Drama movie by P Lankesh starring: Vimala Naidu, P Lankesh, T N Seetharam.

page33.title: Madhuve Madu Tamashe Nodu
page33.description: Maduve Madu Thamashe Nodu is a 1986 Indian Kannada film, directed by Sathya and produced by Dwarakish. The film stars Vishnuvardhan, Aarathi, Dwarkish and Jai Jagadish. The film has a musical score by Vijayanand.

page33.title: Bhakta Kumbara (1974)
page33.description: Bhakta Kumbara is a 1974 Indian Kannada film directed by Hunsur Krishnamurthy. The film stars Rajkumar and Leelavathi in lead roles.

page33.title: Neenade Naa
page33.description: The story is about a boy who works as an assistant director and deals with his struggle in his career and love life. The movie also deals with the issue of women empowerment and stresses the need for women being independent in today`s world.

page33.title: Kendasampige
page33.description: When a love story goes awry, two young lovers are forced to take to the road with the police hot on their heels. They escape across Karnataka in a roller-coaster ride that is at once enthralling, exasperating and nail-biting.

page33.title: Papa Punya
page33.description: A mythological film about the Merit attainable by just seeing the Sri shaila Hill.

page34.title: Kurubara Lakka
page34.description: Based on the Novel of Srikrishna Alanahalli, A 1981 Kannada Drama movie by H M Krishna Murthy starring: Chithra, D Rajendra Babu, Mamatha Shenoy.

page34.title: Giri Kanye
page34.description: Giri Kanye is a 1977 Indian Kannada drama film directed by Dorai - Bhagwan duo. It is based on the novel of the same name by Bharathisutha. The film stars Rajkumar, Jayamala and Vajramuni in lead roles.

page34.title: Kal Manja (2011)
page34.description: Komal Kumar (Manja) is an aspiring film writer. He keeps gate crashing film sets with the hope that some director or the other will approve his script. The script is based on the incidents that have taken place in his life.

page34.title: Prithvi
page34.description: Prithvi Kumar, an honest police officer, is perplexed to find out that the water supply in his city is contaminated and people are dying because of it. He takes up the responsibility to find out the reason and the people behind it.

page34.title: Police Power
page34.description: A 1995 Kannada action movie starring Devaraj, Prema, Sudheer, Ramesh Bhat, Lohithashwa, M V Vasudeva Rao. Directed by Yogish Hunsur.

page34.title: Bettada Hoovu
page34.description: Bettada Hoovu is a 1985 Indian Kannada language film directed by N. Lakshminarayan and produced by Parvathamma Rajkumar. The movie is based on popular novel What then, Raman? by Shirley L Arora.

page35.title: Thavarige Baa Thangi
page35.description: Thavarige Baa Thangi is a 2002 Indian Kannada sentimental drama film directed by Om Sai Prakash and written by Ajay Kumar.

page35.title: Haalu Jenu
page35.description: Haalu Jenu is a 1982 Indian Kannada film directed by Singeetham Srinivasa Rao. The film starred Rajkumar, Madhavi and Roopa Devi in lead roles. The movie is famous for its evergreen songs which was composed by G. K. Venkatesh

page35.title: Godfather (2012 Film)
page35.description: The film is a remake of the 2006 Tamil blockbuster Varalaru .Upendra's performance of a Bharatha Natyam dancer and as an old man bound to his wheelchair was highly acclaimed by critics and is considered one of the best performances of his career.

page35.title: Sedina Sanchu
page35.description: A 1986 Kannada movie directed by T S Nagabharana, produce by B Panduranga Baliga, music by Sathyamy and starring Rajesh, Ramakrishna Hegade, Bhavya, Malathi, K Vijaya.

page35.title: Shabarimale Swamy Ayyappa
page35.description: Shabarimale Swamy Ayyappa is a 1990 Indian Kannada film, directed by Renuka Sharma and produced by Subramaniam Kumar and V Swaminathan. The film stars Sreenivas murthy, Geetha and Master Sanjay in lead roles.

page35.title: Sarasammana Samadhi
page35.description: A 2012 Kannada Drama movie by K N T Shastry starring: Shafi, Lakshmi Hegde, Manasa Joshi

page36.title: Shyloo
page36.description: A couple in love since their childhood are separated when the girl's mother has the boy sent to jail and arranges her wedding to another man.A remake of 2010 released successful Tamil film Mynaa.

page36.title: Santha Shishunala Sharifa
page36.description: The story is based on the life of acclaimed saint poet Shishunala Sharif who wrote several moral poems striving towards social reformation.

page36.title: Sangliyana
page36.description: Sangliana is a 1988 Kannada action drama film directed, co-produced and written by P. Nanjundappa in India. It is loosely inspired by the life story of the cop-turned-politician H. T. Sangliana.

page36.title: Shankar Guru
page36.description: Shankar Guru is a 1978 Indian Kannada film directed by V. Somashekhar starring Rajkumar, Kanchana, Jaimala in lead roles. The supporting cast features Padmapriya, Balakrishna, Vajramuni, Thoogudeepa Srinivas and Uma Shivakumar.

page36.title: Samshaya Phala
page36.description: Samshaya Phala is a 1971 Indian Kannada language romantic drama film written, produced and directed by A. M. Sameullah under the banner of Bawa Movies. It starred Udaya Kumar along with Srinath and Jayanthi in the lead roles.

page36.title: Shankara Punyakoti
page36.description: â€˜Shankara Punyakotiâ€™ traces the highs and the downfall of priest Shankaracharya, caused mainly due to his naivete and the machinations of his sister.

page37.title: Sampathige Savaal
page37.description: Sampathige Savaal is a 1974 Indian Kannada drama film directed by A. V. Seshagiri Rao and produced by A. N. Murthy, based on a play of the same name written by Pi. Bi. Dhuttaragi. The film stars Rajkumar, Vajramuni and Manjula in lead roles.

page37.title: Sakshathkara
page37.description: Sakshatkara is a 1971 Kannada drama film directed by Puttanna Kanagal featuring Rajkumar, Jamuna and Prithviraj Kapoor.

page37.title: Sidlingu
page37.description: Yogesh nurses a childhood dream of owning a car. This desperation makes him befriend anyone who owns a personal car.Hitching rides at ease he strengthens his obsession to own a car. Finally, he comes in contact with Mangala, a school teacher.

page37.title: Sipayi
page37.description: Sipayi is a Kannada film released in 1996, directed and produced by V. Ravichandran. This film starred Ravichandran, Soundarya and Telugu actor Chiranjeevi in an extended cameo appearance. Music and lyrics were composed by Hamsalekha.

page37.title: Snehitharu
page37.description: This is the story of four close friends who share all their joys and sorrows. They also face embarrassing situations in their attempt to make some quick money. Finally they become heroes when they save a boy from the clutches of terrorists.

page37.title: Sose Thanda Sowbhagya
page37.description: Sose Tanda Soubhagya is a 1977 Kannada film written by P. B. Duttaragi, directed by A. V. Sheshagiri Rao, and starring Vishnuvardhan and Manjula. It is the first CinemaScope movie made in Kannada .

page38.title: Sree Renuka Devi
page38.description: Sri Renukadevi is a Kannada mythological movie, directed by Nagendra Magadi Pandu. The cast of Sri Renukadevi includes Saikumar,Soundarya.

page38.title: Sri Renuka Devi Mahatme
page38.description: A 1977 Kannada Religious, Mythology movie by C S Rao starring: B Saroja Devi, Rajesh, Uday kumar.

page38.title: Swarna Gowri
page38.description: Swarna Gowri is a 1962 Indian Kannada film, directed by Y. R. Swamy and produced by D R Naidu. The film stars Rajkumar, Krishnakumari, Udaykumar and Narasimharaju in lead roles. The film had musical score by M. Venkataraju

page38.title: Swathi Muthu
page38.description: A mentally disabled man marries a widow in a temple in front of all the people. Then how they live is the story. A remake of superhit Telugu film Swati Mutyam (1986).

page38.title: Saaku Magalu
page38.description: Saaku Magalu is a 1963 Kannada language romantic drama film directed and produced by B. R. Panthulu and starring Rajkumar and Sowcar Janaki in the lead roles.

page38.title: Taj Mahal
page38.description: The story begins on the backdrop of a college where Ajay is studying. He sees Shruthi for the first time and falls in love. From then on, he keeps wishing her and so intense is his emotion that he keeps recording the number of times he has wished her.

page39.title: Tharle Nan Maga
page39.description: The story revolves around a miserly couple Urbagal and Subbalakshmi, who want their son Santosh to marry a rich girl, for want of dowry. Santosh, however, marries a girl from a poor financial background, antagonizing them.

page39.title: Raktha Kanneeru
page39.description: A spoilt rich boy spend his days in a brothel and is addicted to many bad habits. His family forcefully gets him married to a village girl. A grave disease strikes him and he soon realizes that his path was wrong.

page39.title: Rajani Kantha
page39.description: Rajani, an intelligent student who dreams of becoming a successful professional, but suffers from speech defect due to a surgery done for cleft lip. His brother Kantha is a rough and tough guy who hates his brother.

page39.title: Raja Narasimha
page39.description: Raja Narasimha, a wealthy landlord, treats women with utmost respect.One day  he saves Mahalakshmifrom rowdies. She is pleased with the simplicity and the humbleness of the landlord and decides to marry him in spite of the fact that she is engaged.

page39.title: Thande Makkalu
page39.description: A 1971 Kannada Drama movie by S V SriKanth starring: Jayanthi, B Saroja Devi, Srinath.

page39.title: Thayiye Nanna Devaru
page39.description: Nanna Devaru is a 1982 Kannada film directed by B. Mallesh and produced by K. S. Ashok. The story is written by R. Selvaraj. The film starred Ananth Nag, Sujatha, Tiger Prabhakar and K. S. Ashwath in lead roles.

page40.title: Raja Nanna Raja
page40.description: Raja Nanna Raja is a 1976 Kannada romance film directed by A. V. Sheshagiri Rao and produced by A. L. Abbaiah Naidu. The film starred Rajkumar, Aarathi and Chandrashekar in the lead roles. The songs composed by G. K.

page40.title: Raam (2009)
page40.description: Pooja's rich uncles try to forcibly marry her off and Raam rescues her from this marriage. She falls in love with him, but her uncles don't approve of him. Now it is up to Raam to win their hearts. A remake of Ready, a 2008 Telugu film!!

page40.title: Puthra
page40.description: Putra movie is a remake of tamil movie Emmtan-Magan.It is a good entertainer with a strong message and an emotional narration and it tells about father and son intimacy and clash in a crux.

page40.title: Prema Loka
page40.description: When a young man (V. Ravichandran) is rejected, he poses as a mysterious biker and sweeps the source of his infatuation (Juhi Chawla) off her feet.

page40.title: Preethse 2000
page40.description: The film is a remake of the 1993 Bollywood film Darr and it is a romantic thriller directed by D Rajendra Babu.

page40.title: Thirupathi (2006 Kannada Film)
page40.description: Tirupati starts an investigation and finds out that Michael Raj who is the kingpin of the whole mafia is none other than his own father Dhanpal.He uses his intelligence and fighting prowess to take the leaf out of the villains and emerge victoriously.

page41.title: Preethigaagi
page41.description: A remake of the 1997 Malayalam film, Aniyathipraavu. The plot is of a love story between a Hindu boy and a Christian girl, who relationship is not approved by their families, who eventually elope.

page41.title: Parasangada Gendethimma
page41.description: Parasangada Gendethimma is a 1978 Indian Kannada language comedy-drama film directed by Maruthi Shivram, based on a novel of the same by Srikrishna Alanahalli. It stars Lokesh in the lead role.

page41.title: Veera Kesari
page41.description: Veera Kesari is a 1963 Indian Kannada film, directed by B. Vittalacharya and produced by Sundarlal Nahatha and Doondi. The film stars Rajkumar, T. N. Balakrishna, Udaykumar and R. Nagendra Rao in lead roles. The film had musical score by Ghantasala.

page41.title: Venkata In Sankata
page41.description: The film is all about a traffic constable Venkata who dreams big to become a commissioner. Situations provoke him to become a target for all the troubles that happen around him.

page41.title: Pedda Gedda
page41.description: Pedda Gedda is a 1982 Indian Kannada film, directed by H. R. Bhargava and produced by Dwarakish. The film stars Dwarakish, Aarathi, Jayamala and Sundar Krishna Urs in lead roles. The film had musical score by K. V. Mahadevan.

page41.title: Yaarode Duddu Yellammana Jathre
page41.description: Yaarode Duddu Yellammana Jathre is a Kannada comedy movie, directed by A.R.Babu. The cast of Yaarode Duddu Yellammana Jathre includes Jaggesh,Devaraj.

page42.title: Eddelu Manjunatha
page42.description: A woman kills the child in her womb on realizing that her lazy, alcoholic husband would not be a good father. When the man demands an answer for her act, the unborn infant appears in front of him, accusing him of her murder.

page42.title: Parodi
page42.description: Vijay (Upendra), is abandoned by his mother and takes refuge with Ranganna, a social activist. When land grabbers kill Raganna, Vijay takes the law into his hands. Later, he is tried and sentenced to death.

page42.title: Orata I Love You
page42.description: Varada, a slum rowdy falls in love with Kavya.But the girl dislikes him as she is already in love with Santhosh. After the engagement, she comes to know that Santhosh is a fraud and Varada saves her from embarrassment.

page42.title: Onde Guri - Ee Jeeva Ninagagi
page42.description: Onde Guri is a 1983 Indian Kannada film, directed by H. R. Bhargava and produced by M P Shankar. The film stars Vishnuvardhan, M. P. Shankar, Ramakrishna and Madhavi in lead roles. The film had musical score by Rajan-Nagendra.

page42.title: Ondanondu Kaladalli
page42.description: Ondanondu Kaladalli is a 1978 Indian Kannada language film co-written and directed by Girish Karnad with music by Bhaskar Chandavarkar, starring Shankar Nag.

page42.title: Omkara
page42.description: Omkara was Upendra's first gangster film and was based on the connection between film industries and the Mumbai underworld mafia.

page43.title: Om
page43.description: The film's plot revolves around Satya, son of a priest who becomes a gangster after his lover framed him in a murder. Rest of the film is about Satya leaving the rowdyism.It remains a cult classic Indian film!!

page43.title: Odahuttidavaru
page43.description: The story revolved around the two farming brothers who undergo various traumas in the relationships due to the external forces and fight them to reunion again. The film met with immense appreciation from the critics and was a blockbuster.

page43.title: Masth Maja Maadi
page43.description: A group of rich and wayward youngsters gets a lead to the treasure hidden in the Ooty Botanical Gardens. Will they strike gold?

page43.title: Kurunadu
page43.description: The story begins on the backdrop of a remote island that goes by the name of â€˜Kurunaduâ€™. True to its name, the inhabitants of this place have no clue as to what is happening outside and where the world is heading.

page43.title: Kruthi
page43.description: A 2012 Kannada family movie starring Baby Prakruthi Prasad, Baby Pragathi, Master Manjunath, Ninasam Ashwath, Shama, Nanjundaiah, Best Club Jayaram and others.Directed by P R Ramadas Naidu

page43.title: Krishna
page43.description: A successful actor (Ganesh) is on the brink of finding true romance, until the woman (Sharmiela Mandre) who broke his heart comes back into his life.

page44.title: Krishna Nee Begane Baro (1986)
page44.description: Krishna Nee Begane Baro is a 1986 Indian Kannada film, directed by H. R. Bhargava and produced by Amrutha Singh, Anuradha Singh and Dushyanth Singh. The film stars Vishnuvardhan, Bhavya, Kim and Mukhyamantri Chandru in lead roles.

page44.title: Kote
page44.description: Kote is a 2011 Kannada-language film directed by Srinivasa Raju and produced by Manjunath and GN Murthy. Prajwal Devaraj and Gayatri Rao are the lead pair of the film. Raghu Dixit has composed the music for the film.

page44.title: Kool...Sakkath Hot Maga
page44.description: Rahul is a carefree college student who falls for Kajal. But, Rahul is reported dead in an accident. Kajal moves to Hasiru Bettu where she meets Manohar aka MJ, who resembles Rahul.

page44.title: Kittu Puttu
page44.description: Kittu Puttu is a 1977 Indian Kannada comedy drama film directed by C. V. Rajendran and produced by Dwarakish. The film features Vishnuvardhan, Dwarakish, Manjula and Vaishali Kasaravalli in the lead roles.

page44.title: Kempu Gulabi
page44.description: A 1990 Kannada musical romantic movie starring Ambarish, Ramesh Aravind, Parijatha, Leelavathi, Hema Choudhary, Dheerendra Gopal, Saikumar. Directed by Vijay.

page44.title: Kanasembo Kudureyaneri
page44.description: Irya, a gravedigger, sees Siddhas in his dreams before someone in the village dies. His faith is tested when he sees a Siddha in a dream and no one dies.

page45.title: Kalpana
page45.description: A remake of the 2011 Tamil film Kanchana. Raghava suffers from an irrational fear of ghosts. One day, Raghava and his friends are forced to abandon their usual cricket ground and find an abandoned ground which is rumored to be haunted.

page45.title: Kaadu
page45.description: Kaadu is a 1973 Indian Kannada film written and directed by Girish Karnad. The screenplay was based on a novel of the same name by Srikrishna Alanahalli. It stars Master G. S. Nataraj, Amrish Puri and Nandini Bhaktavatsala in the lead roles.

page45.title: Kaadu Kudure
page45.description: Kaadu Kudure is a 1979 Indian Kannada drama film directed, written and composed by Chandrashekhara Kambara and produced by Wheel Productions. The story based on Kambara's own play Kaadu Kudure.

page45.title: Kadlimatti Station Master
page45.description: Kadlimatti Station Master release in year 2000. Director by Shankaralinga Sugnally, Music by Amarapriya and starring Shruthi, Charanraj, Abhijith, Taara, Doddanna, Maduri, Vijaya Saigal.

page45.title: Joke Falls
page45.description: Botany professor Anant Patil falls in love with Sulkeha and marries her to the dismay of Sulekha's brother in law, Raghav Joshi. Raghav refuses to attend the wedding. But Anant decides to turn the tables on Raghav and teach him a lesson.

page45.title: Johny Mera Naam Preethi Mera Kaam
page45.description: Johnny runs a Johnny Service Centre along with colony friend Maamoo. He falls in love with Priya, who comes to the colony from abroad.The story takes a dramatic turn when Johnny finds that Priya is in love with Rakesh.

page46.title: Hubli
page46.description: "Hubli" is the story which starts with an unidentified wounded person in a state of unconsciousness being saved by an ex-service man. His daughter donates blood to him and saves his life. But his memory fails him.

page46.title: Hejjegalu
page46.description: It's about the struggle of a girl who tries to reform her father who has earned a bad reputation by misusing bank money by playing cards and gambling. How does she do it?

page46.title: Shishya
page46.description: Venkatesh, shishya of Chandrappa, is an underworld don. He works for his â€˜worshipful masterâ€™ who has brought him up. However, things change when his masterâ€™s daughter falls in love with shishya. But shishya does not love her.

page46.title: No. 73, Shanthi Nivasa
page46.description: A large family seems to do well on the surface, but it lacks two very important things a family should have - peace and harmony. A cook enters their home and slowly becomes the solution to all of their troubles.

page46.title: Govindaya Namaha
page46.description: The story of a man called Govinda who falls in love with four girls.A complete mass entertainer with Komal at his best. With excellent dialogues and music, director Pavan Wadeyar has put the right step forward in his first movie.

page46.title: Googly
page46.description: Sharath leads a carefree life, meets Swathi at one of the college events. Their friendship turns into a mutual attraction but hesitant to confess their feelings. Due to a small misunderstanding they part ways. Will they ever meet again?

page48.title: Bulbul
page48.description: `Bulbul` takes off from a college farewell party and depicts the friendship between college friends even decades after they have passed out from college. This rom-com is a remake of the Telugu film Darling.

page48.title: Bhootayyna Maga Ayyu
page48.description: Bhootayyana Maga Ayyu is 1974 Indian Kannada language film directed by Siddalingaiah, based on the novel Vayyari by Gorur Ramaswamy Iyengar, and starring Vishnuvardhan, Lokesh and M. P. Shankar in lead roles.

page48.title: Brindavana
page48.description: A remake of Telugu film Brindavanam (2010).The main story of the movie is about two step brothers Saikumar and Sampath Raj. They are two big shots in a village and both of them are rivals.

page48.title: Vamshi
page48.description: Vamshi is a trainee in a police academy, who often gets angry in any circumstance. Vamshi's anger and the past make him lose his interview. His past reveals that he is the son of a rowdy K.R., who was recently murdered by the other group led by Jayachandra.

page48.title: Ugadi
page48.description: Sanjay and Cauvery are married off in Switzerland but unfortunately, during her delivery, she loses her life. Sanjay comes to India with his child to attend a wedding from Cauvery's family. There he meets Priya, a girl madly in love with him.

page48.title: Yuddha Kaanda
page48.description: Yuddha Kaanda is a 1989 Indian Kannada movie directed by K. V. Raju and starring Ravichandran, Poonam Dhillon. It is a remake of the 1985 Hindi film Meri Jung.

page50.title: Cheluvina Chittara
page50.description: The movie is a remake of Tamil film Kaadhal.Maadesha works as a mechanic in a garage. He is liked by an innocent school-going girl who is the daughter of a local don. Maadesha is deeply in love with her and they decide to marry. They elope.

page50.title: Dweepa
page50.description: Dweepa deals with the raging issue of building dams and the displacement of natives. Based on the novel of the same name by Na D'Souza.

page50.title: Ee Preethi Eke Bhoomi Melide
page50.description: Ee Preethi Yeke Bhoomi Melide is a 2007 Kannada romance film directed, written and enacted by Prem. The film also features Rohini, Namratha and Sharan in other pivotal roles.

page50.title: Devadasi
page50.description: A 1978 Kannada Drama movie by C V Raju starring: Master Hirannaiah, Kumari Latha, M M Nagaraj.

page50.title: Darshan
page50.description: Darshan is a 2004 Kannada surprise-thriller film starring Darshan and Navaneeth in leading roles, along with a supporting cast of Srujan Lokesh, Srinath, and Chithra Shenoy

page50.title: Cyanide
page50.description: The plot of the film set in and around Bangalore from 1 August to 20 August 1991, deals with incidents surrounding the assassins of former Indian Prime Minister.

page52.title: Bhoomige Banda Bhagavantha
page52.description: Bhoomige Banda Bhagavantha is a 1981 Indian Kannada film, directed by K. S. L. Swamy and produced by S P Varadaraj and J Chandulal Jain. The film stars Lokesh, Lakshmi, Jai Jagadish and Vajramuni in lead roles. The film had musical score by G. K.

page52.title: Bheema Theeradalli
page52.description: Based on a real-life incident that occurred in 1985 in North Karnataka during the time of the dreaded dacoit, Chandappa Harijana.

page52.title: Bhaktha Siriyala
page52.description: Bhaktha Siriyala is a Indian Kannada-language film directed by Hunsur Krishnamurthy. The film features Lokesh, K S Ashwath, Thoogudeepa Srinivas, Sundar Krishna Urs and Aarathi in the lead roles.

page52.title: Bhagavan Sri Saibaba
page52.description: Cast : Om Saiprakash, Shashikumar (GN), Sudharani, Thara, Srinath, Dheerendra Gopal, Mukyamanthri Chandru, Jai Jagadish.Director : Om Saiprakash

page52.title: Benki Birugali
page52.description: Directed by Thiptur Raghu, produce by Smt H V Sowbhagya, music by M Ranga Rao and Starring Vishnuvardhan, Shankarnag, Jayanthi, Jayamala, Jai Jagadish.

page52.title: Bara
page52.description: Bara is a 1982 Kannada film directed and produced by M. S. Sathyu. It is based on the story written by U. R. Ananthamurthy. The film starred Ananth Nag, C. R. Simha and Loveleen Madhu in lead roles.

page53.title: Chandra Chakori
page53.description: Chandra Chakori is a 2003 Kannada romance- drama film directed and written by S. Narayan.

page53.title: Chalisuva Modagalu
page53.description: Chalisuva Modagalu is a 1982 Indian Kannada film directed by Singeetham Srinivasa Rao. The film starred Rajkumar, Saritha, Ambika and K. S. Ashwath in lead roles

page53.title: Beli Mattu Hola
page53.description: Beli Mattu Hola Movie focuses on the futility of the system of governance prevailing in the villages of South India.

page53.title: Bedara Kannappa
page53.description: Bedara Kannappa is a 1954 Indian Kannada film directed by H. L. N. Simha and written by G. V. Iyer. It stars Pandari Bai and Rajkumar in lead roles.

page53.title: Avva
page53.description: The film speaks about the modern day rural lifestyle, where the caste system, politics and human greed takes over the traditional human values.

page53.title: Attahasa
page53.description: Kishore plays the role of Veerappan in the film which also features Arjun Sarja and Vijayalakshmi in the leading roles. The film has simultaneously been released in Tamil and is titled `Vanayutham`.

page54.title: Bhale Jodi
page54.description: Bhale Jodi is a 1970 Indian Kannada language drama film written and directed by Y. R. Swamy. It stars Rajkumar in dual roles with Bharathi and Dinesh in other lead roles.

page54.title: Babruvahana
page54.description: Babruvahana is a 1977 Indian Kannada mythological film directed by Hunsur Krishnamurthy starring Rajkumar in a dual role. The supporting cast features B. Saroja Devi, Kanchana, Jayamala, Vajramuni, Thoogudeepa Srinivas and Ramakrishna.

page54.title: Eno Onthara
page54.description: Surya develops a close relationship with Madhumathi. But their ego clashes do not let them stay together peacefully.However, both try to reunite their friends Shanthi and Prasad, who are in love.

page54.title: Nanda
page54.description: Nanda falls in love with Kavya but as fate would have it, he tends to fall on the wrong books of Kavya's mother and eventually her uncle, who happens to be the commissioner of police.

page54.title: Naagarahaavu
page54.description: The story revolves around a short tempered, yet affable college student named Ramachari. Ramachari is unpopular in the whole town of Chitradurga as an ill-tempered boy and is disliked by many people in his college.

page54.title: Myna
page54.description: The story revolves around Myna (Nithya Menen) who has lost both her legs due to polio. Sathya (Chethan), an orphan, falls in love with her. They get married and are set to lead a happy life.

page55.title: Modalasala
page55.description: Karthik falls in love with Bhama.To their surprise, father of Karthik and Bhama's parents agree to their marriage. The story takes a curious turn when Karthik's father comes to know of the family background of Bhama's father and refuses the alliance.

page55.title: Mayor Muthanna
page55.description: Mayor Muthanna is a 1969 Indian Kannada-language film directed by Siddalingaiah. The film stars Rajkumar and Bharathi. The film was Siddalingaiah's first as a director and actor Dwarkish's first productional venture.

page55.title: Naviladavaru
page55.description: Naviladavaru is a Kannada drama movie, directed by Giriraj. The cast of Naviladavaru includes Pradeep, Achyuth Kumar. This movie was made in 35,000 INR .

page55.title: Narada Vijaya
page55.description: Narada Vijaya is a 1980 mythological - comedy Kannada film directed and co-produced by Siddalingaiah. The story is written by M. D. Sundar. The film starred Ananth Nag, Padmapriya and M. P. Shankar in lead roles.

page55.title: Nanu Gandhi
page55.description: The film focuses on the systematic transformation in the society because of the global reforms and greedy consumerism.The film runs like a discourse on the issues of globalization and relevance of Gandhian values.

page55.title: Nanobba Kalla
page55.description: Nanobba Kalla is a 1979 Indian Kannada film directed by Dorai-Bhagawan and produced by Rashi Brothers. The film stars Rajkumar in dual roles and Lakshmi in lead roles.Rajkumar also comes as Dr.Rajkumar in one scene.

page56.title: Nagadevathe
page56.description: Kaamanaaga, devotee of Goddess Kali comes to earth. In the human form, he fulfills his base desires at the temple. For appearance, he is a mystic but troubles the good people. To check him and punish the evil doers, Goddess Kali takes a human form.

page56.title: Naanu Naane
page56.description: Naanu Naane is a Kannada action - drama movie, directed by D.Rajendra Babu. The cast of Naanu Naane includes Upendra,Sakshi Shivananda.

page56.title: Meera Madhava Raghava
page56.description: Meera, a singer, marries Madhava, a teacher from a poor family, ignoring Raghava, a rowdy, who loves her. Meera urges him to quit his job and pursue his dream of becoming an IAS officer. She even promises to get the money from her brother to pay for his training.

page56.title: Mayura
page56.description: The film opens in Kanchi with Mayura, a Brahmin youth challenging an arrogant wrestler and defeating him. Mayura had never been formally trained and had only learned techniques of wrestling by observing other wrestlers.

page56.title: Nagamandala
page56.description: The film touches one of the most sensitive issues of marital life. It throws open a question as to who is the husband â€“ the person who marries an innocent girl and indulges in self pleasures or the person who gives the real and complete experience of life.

page56.title: Munnudi
page56.description: Nearly two decades after her own husband left her, a woman (Tara) has difficulty finding a man for her daughter.The film is about the misuse of Shariat by opportunistic men and the manipulation of the testaments on "Nikah" and "Talaaq".

page57.title: Mooruvare Vajragalu
page57.description: Mooroovare Vajragalu is a 1973 Indian Kannada film directed by Y. R. Swamy. The film stars Rajkumar, Srinath, Jayanthi, Aarathi and Manjula in lead roles.

page57.title: Mooru Guttu Ondu Sullu Ondu Nija
page57.description: An old couple decides to go on a pilgrimage. Their son, Siddu and three daughters decide to have some fun and call their respective lovers over. But things don't go as planned when a stranger by the name of Appu, who claims to be their relative, visits them!

page57.title: Monalisa
page57.description: Monalisa is a Kannada romance movie, directed by Indrajit Lankesh. The cast of Monalisa includes Sameer Dattani,Sada.

page57.title: Atithi
page57.description: The film deals with terrorism and the psychology of the terrorist.At the 49th National Film Awards, the film was awarded the Best Feature Film in Kannada.

page57.title: Arivu
page57.description: The interaction between children and parents and the impact of this relationship on the total community.

page57.title: Apthamitra
page57.description: An official remake of the 1993 Malayalam film Manichithrathazhu.An ancient palatial house, believed to be occupied by a vengeful spirit of a Courtesan named Nagavalli, is purchased by an Engineer, Ramesh, and his wife, Ganga.

page58.title: Appu
page58.description: Appuavaru (Puneet Rajkumar) hails from a lower middle class family, but falls in love with a pretty girl Suchitra (Rakshita),daughter of Commissioner of Police. A story about love, action and family values

page58.title: Antha
page58.description: Antha is a 1981 Indian Kannada film directed by S. V. Rajendra Singh Babu. The film stars Ambareesh, Lakshmi and Latha in lead roles. The film went on become a huge success and is viewed as a milestone in Ambareesh's career.

page58.title: Africadalli Sheela
page58.description: After her parents are killed a baby girl grows up in a jungle with only animals as friends, guardians, and companions. As a young woman she finally meets a young man.

page58.title: Viraat
page58.description: The story thinly revolves around power shortage aptly freshened up by ample doses of action, comedy and love.

page58.title: Vajrakaya
page58.description: Vajrakaya is the heart touching story of a young man Viraj who goes in search of his mother.

page58.title: Maanikya
page58.description: Age old rivalry that exists between two sects of a village. How does love and peace change attitude of ruthless factionists?

page59.title: Muthina Haara
page59.description: Mutthina Haara - A Necklace of Pearls - tells the tale of an Indian (Coorg) soldier, Achchappa and an army nurse, Annapurna (Anu) and the toils of warfare on them during the 1940's to the 1960's.

page59.title: Diggajaru
page59.description: The movie was a remake of Tamil hit Natpukkaga.Diggajaru is a 2001 Indian Kannada film directed by D. Rajendra Babu. The film stars Vishnuvardhan and Ambareesh in lead roles.

page59.title: Daari Tappida Maga
page59.description: Daari Tappida Maga is a 1975 Indian Kannada film produced and directed by Peketi Sivaram. The film stars Rajkumar, Kalpana, Aarathi, Manjula, Jayamala in lead roles with K. S. Ashwath, Vajramuni and Thoogudeepa Srinivas playing supporting roles.

page59.title: Mussanje
page59.description: Mussanje portrays various facts of life that a person is forced to undergo in the dusk of his life. It pans on the mental status of the aged, their struggle to cope with the changing times and values, their fight to overcome loneliness.

page59.title: H2O
page59.description: The movie is a triangular love story between a Kannadiga and a Tamilian vying for the love of a girl called Kaveri. It is actually a metaphorical reference for the river Cauvery dispute between Karnataka and Tamil Nadu.

page59.title: Mouni
page59.description: Kuppanna Bhatta and Appanna Bhatta are areca cultivators and custodians of the mathâ€™s property. The story revolves around the tensions and circumstances that shape and influence their relationship.

page60.title: Ayya (Kannada Movie)
page60.description: Darshan plays the role of a brave police officer prepared to go any lengths to control crime in the city. "Naan convent alli odi police agiddalla. Corporation school alli odi police aagiddu"

page60.title: Dandupalya
page60.description: Based on the real-life exploits of a gang named 'Dandupalya'.Lakshmi, leader of the gang, spots houses where women are alone. She goes to the house asking for water. When people go inside, the entire gang enter the house and kill women.

page60.title: Chiranjeevi Rajegowda
page60.description: A 1995 Kannada action movie starring Tiger Prabhakar, Dolly, Vidyashree, Doddanna, Dheerendra Gopal.Directed by Joe Simon.

page60.title: Arjun
page60.description: Arjun (Darshan) is a Police officer who is high on integrity and moral values. His father has ensured that he retains high moral values by depositing around Rs. 150 crores in the Bank in his sonâ€™s name.

page60.title: Ramachaari
page60.description: The film was a remake of Tamil superhit film Chinna Thambi (1991).A rich girl is guarded by her possessive brothers due to an astrologer's prediction, that she will marry a man from a lower caste, against their wishes. Can they stop the wheels of fate?

page60.title: Thavarina Siri
page60.description: Mutthanna (Shivarajkumar) brings up his sisters after his parentsâ€™ death. He struggles hard and becomes a rich and noble man in his village. He gets his two sisters married to a doctor and an engineer.

page61.title: Tananam Tananam
page61.description: Tananam Tananam is a 2006 Indian Kannada romantic musical drama film directed and written by Kavitha Lankesh.

page61.title: Satya Harishchandra
page61.description: Satya Harischandra is a 1965 Indian Kannada epic film directed by Hunsur Krishnamurthy and produced by K. V. Reddy.

page61.title: Samskara
page61.description: Samskara is a 1970 Indian Kannada film written by U. R. Ananthamurthy based on his novel of the same name, and directed and produced by Pattabhirama Reddy.

page61.title: Prem Adda
page61.description: A remake of Tamil film Subramaniapuram.What begins as a murder for loyalty by our hero Ranga (Prem) and his friend Seena (Muralikrishna) continues as revenge with more than half-a-dozen murders.

page61.title: Nee Bareda Kadambari
page61.description: Nee Bareda Kadambari is a 1985 Indian Kannada language film directed and produced by Dwarakish, making his first entry as a director. The film starred Vishnuvardhan, Bhavya and C. R. Simha in the lead roles.

page61.title: Haggada Kone
page61.description: Haggada Kone is an experimental film based on the Kannada play written by the popular writer Shri Parvathavani in the 1960s. The film features Krishna as Channa, a prisoner awaiting his execution.

page63.title: Kotigobba
page63.description: The film was a remake of Tamil film Baashha (1995)Kotigobba is a 2001 Indian Kannada-language action film starring Vishnuvardhan, Priyanka Upendra and Ashish Vidyarthi in the lead roles.

page63.title: Durgi
page63.description: Durgi is Kannada action film directed by P. Ravi Shankar who made his directorial debut and starring Malashri in the lead role.The film is about a female rowdy seeking revenge against politicians who raped and killed her sister.

page63.title: Dubai Babu
page63.description: Duped by an agent who promises to send him to Dubai, Babu gets stuck in Mumbai and opens a food stall. There he falls for Vasundhara but she soon goes off to become a radio jockey in Bangalore.

page63.title: Hudugaru
page63.description: The story revolves around three friends who are desperately looking out for suitable job opportunities. Their lives get devastated when they try to unite two lovers.A remake of the successful 2010 Tamil film Naadodigal.

page63.title: Ajagajantara
page63.description: A woman sells her husband to a richer woman with hilarious consequences. What happens when a woman who wants the good life puts her husband up for sale? Will her husband be willing to be sold?

page63.title: Puttakkana Highway
