page63.description: The story exploits both the darker and brighter sides of the land acquisition scam. The story is set in a remote village where people make their living through farming.Based on the novel 'Puttakkana Medical College' by director Nagathihalli Chandrasekhar.

page64.title: Oggarane
page64.description: A misplaced phone call connects two lonely people. However, when it's time to match faces to voices, both parties send younger representatives.

page64.title: Mangalyam Tantunanena
page64.description: A man decides to get married after a lot of persuasion from his father but on a condition. He wants to marry a girl on a year agreement and see if he likes it, if yes then he will continue the marriage and if not then he will annul the marriage.

page64.title: Kendada Male
page64.description: A 1987 action drama Kannada movie starring Nagesh Kashyap, Devaraj, Sundar Krishna Urs, Ashok Badardinni.

page64.title: Indina Ramayana
page64.description: Indina Ramayana is a 1984 Indian Kannada film, directed by Rajachandra and produced by Dwarakish. The film stars Vishnuvardhan, Gayathri, Sridhar and Tulasi in lead roles. The film had musical score by Vijayanand.

page64.title: Drama
page64.description: This movie is for the young hearts. There is mischief, romance, pranks and a fight too in the story with a Yogaraj Bhat touch. It's a timepass movie that keeps you engaged with good dialogues and lively narration.

page64.title: Bombaat
page64.description: Shalini, daughter of the Police Commissioner, sees a street ruffian, Anand wreaking havoc in the city. But Anand is actually quite benign and she has to take his help to get out of the clutches of a nasty mafia donâ€™s son.

page65.title: Beru
page65.description: Beru (The Root) is an attempt to give a wake-up call to raise the consciousness of society about many such issues.The film was awarded the National Film Award for Best Feature Film in Kannada at the 52nd National Film Awards.

page65.title: Thangigagi
page65.description: A remake of Tamil blockbuster film Thirupaachi. The film mainly displays the brother â€” sister sentiments with action backdrop.

page65.title: Ranna
page65.description: A super rich man is pining for his daughter who left him 25 years ago. He wants her back in the family. The impossible task can be done only by his grandson Bhargava. How Bhargava manages to unite the family members is the story.

page65.title: Pravaha
page65.description: Pravaha is a Kannada drama, about Marappa and family who sell clay pots. As everyone cheats him, it becomes difficult for him to look after his family

page65.title: Namma Preethiya Ramu
page65.description: A remake of the Malayalam film Vasanthiyum Lakshmiyum Pinne Njaanum.The film stars Darshan playing the eponymous character of a blind village singer.

page65.title: Kiccha
page65.description: Kiccha, an unemployed gold medalist tries his best to get a job but due to corrupt bribe system, he fails to get any job.  This story tells how an intelligent unemployed youth enters politics and turns big playing their own game against them.

page66.title: Jothe Jotheyali
page66.description: As the movie starts both of the lead characters arrive at the Family court, to seek divorce. The actual movie unfolds in Flashback scenes as both remember - how they met and fell in love.

page66.title: Jogi
page66.description: In the opening scene, a dreaded underworld don is brutally hacked to death by an unknown assailant. The murder is revealed to be the handiwork of a novice, Madesha alias Jogi, who works in a roadside tea stall.

page66.title: Bharath Stores
page66.description: Govinda Shetty doesn't accept globalization which brought the countries nearer. Because even he was a part when India also accepted these which resulting in the gradual change in the lifestyle by popping up Malls and Marts.

page66.title: Punda Prachanda
page66.description: Punda Prachanda is a Kannada drama movie, directed by Sudhindra Kallola. The cast of Punda Prachanda includes Ramesh Aravind,Shruti.

page66.title: Gubbachigalu
page66.description: Gubbachigalu(Sparrows). A 2009 Kannada Drama, Kids movie by Abhaya Simha starring: Abhilash, Prakruthi.

page66.title: Ghatashraddha
page66.description: Ghatashraddha is a 1977 Indian Kannada language film directed by Girish Kasaravalli starring Meena Kuttappa, Naraya Bhat and Ajith Kumar in lead roles. It is based on a novella by eminent Kannada writer U. R. Ananthamurthy.

page67.title: Chomana Dudi
page67.description: Chomana Dudi is a feature film in the Kannada language. It is based on a novel of the same name, written by Shivaram Karanth. The film was released in the year 1975 and won the Swarna Kamal, India's National Award for the best film.

page67.title: Annavru
page67.description: Annavru has the theme which is loosely based on the friendship between Karna and Duryodhana of the Hindu epic, Mahabharata.The film is the remake of acclaimed director Mani Ratnam' s Rajinikanth-Mammootty Tamil hit Thalapathi.

page67.title: Prajegalu Prabhugalu
page67.description: A 1992 Kannada movie starring Devaraj, Sundar Raj, Lokanath, Doddanna, Mysore Lokesh. Directed by Bi Ma Nagaraj, Smt Vijayalakshmi Vishukumar.

page67.title: Kubi Matthu Iyaala
page67.description: The plot revolves around a remote village which is filled with superstitious beliefs and a doctor stationed in the village tries to wipe out all the superstition among the villagers.

page67.title: Narasajjana Nursery
page67.description: "Narasajja's Nursery" is an environmental based popular short story published in the Kannada weekly "Mangala". The story is about the emotions of old age person and his struggle against the destroying of nature by rapid urbanization.

page67.title: Laali Haadu
page67.description: Laali Haadu is a 2003 Indian Kannada romantic musical film directed by H. Vasu and written by Ajay Kumar.

page68.title: Galige
page68.description: Orphaned, but a girl with an unusual grit and courage, Nithya meets a poor couple who claim to be her grand parents. Though suspicious of them, she supports them. She falls in love with a terrorist boy, who is hunted by the police.

page68.title: Ee Bandhana
page68.description: The story is about an old couple who are very much attached to each other but forced into separation by their children -- Each parent has to stay in their respective children's house.A remake of Hindi film Baghban (2003)

page68.title: Vimukthi
page68.description: It relates to the sick inmates of Mukthi Bhavan in Varanasi who are waiting for their death and their last rites are performed by volunteers there. All these inmates are either deserted or have come to Varanasi on their own to die in the holy temple town.

page68.title: Jackie
page68.description: Janakirama alias Jackie (played by Puneet Rajkumar) is an 8th standard passed living with his mother Jayamma who operates a flour mill in a village. Jackie is a guy who dreams of making it big; but not by hard work.

page68.title: Prince (Kannada Movie)
page68.description: Prince is a revenge saga of a vibrant youngster Vishnu (Darshan). One in one crore people have their heart on the right side. Vishu is one among that one crore. Vishnu loves Anjali and soon the couple gets married.

page68.title: Jayammana Maga
page68.description: The film is set in the village backdrop and speaks of a mother-son relationship which is falling apart. The film also deals with paranormal issues.

page69.title: Yeradu Kanasu
page69.description: Eradu Kanasu is a 1974 Indian Kannada romantic drama film directed by the duo Dorai and S. K. Bhagavan, and is based on the novel of the same name by Vani. The film stars Rajkumar, Kalpana and Manjula in lead roles.

page69.title: Paramathma
page69.description: Param`s father is a retired cardiologist who is helping children. Param takes up many jobs including that of a Kung Fu expert but finds little peace. He joins college where he has a group of friends who enjoy being unsuccessful in exams.

page69.title: Yodha (Kannada Movie)
page69.description: Yodha is a 2009 Indian Kannada action film directed by Om Prakash Rao and produced by Rockline Venkatesh

page69.title: A
page69.description: It tells the love story between a film director and an actress which is narrated through multiple flashbacks within flashbacks and reverse screenplay.

page69.title: Veera Kannadiga
page69.description: Puneeth has acted in dual roles in this movie, father, and son. Father is a good man and helps the needed. Once in his family function, he is killed by the villains.Later part of the movie is about how son takes his fatherâ€™s role in helping the society.

page69.title: Romeo
page69.description: Ganesh tells a pack of lies to woo Shruti, and they quickly get married. Things get complicated when Shruti realizes Ganesh has lied to her, so he does everything he can to win her back.

page70.title: Lifeu Ishtene
page70.description: Aimless Vishal falls in love with Nandini, but she is forced to marry someone else because of his casual attitude towards life. Will Vishal be able to start afresh with any other girl ?

page70.title: Yejamana
page70.description: Based on the plot of Tamil film Vanathai Pola.Story of a family of four brothers. A modern-day take on the classic Ramayana.

page70.title: Sharapanjara
page70.description: Sharapanjara is a 1971 Indian Kannada language film directed by Puttanna Kanagal, based on a novel by Triveni of the same name, and starring Kalpana and Gangadhar in lead roles. This film is considered one of the best Kannada movies ever made

page70.title: Power (Kannada)
page70.description: Based on the 2011 Telugu film, Dookudu.A powerful political leader, the man of the masses, is loved by everyone in the society. He is also a doting father, who wants his son to follow in his footsteps.

page70.title: Olave Mandara
page70.description: Srikanth, a son of a rich industrialist, meets Preeti, an Assamese girl, in a dance competition in Coimbatore, and falls in love with her. His initial intentions were to only steal a few kisses from her. Bound by guilt, he sets off on foot to Assam to meet her as promised.

page70.title: Mylari
page70.description: Mylari, a village youth, is a complete contrast to his academically oriented younger brother. His love for his classmate, Anitha, finds expression in beautiful poetry, but his father does not think poetry or writing make for a lucrative career.

page71.title: Slum Bala
page71.description: Slum Bala is a simpleminded bar bouncer in Mumbai. He meets Mallige and defends her honor. Later, he is called to Bangalore by a local politician and tasked with killing the dangerous gangster Cable Manja.

page71.title: Shakti (Kannada)
page71.description: Malashree in her Full action packed drama film Shakthi Also starring Ravishankar, Hema Chowdary & others. Malashree plays tough cop fighting against corruption.

page71.title: Moggina Manasu
page71.description: The movie deals with the different experiences that women face in tbs field of love, the hardships they face in life and the maturity they gain as they bloom from a bud to a flower.

page71.title: Kaddipudi
page71.description: Kaddipudi, a rowdy sheeter, yearns for a peaceful life, but politicians like Renukaji, his son Gaali and Shankarappa use him as a pawn for their selfish ends.

page71.title: Daasa
page71.description: Daasa is a Kannada action movie, directed by Satya PN. The cast of Daasa includes Darshan,Avinash.

page71.title: Ambari
page71.description: The film deals with the journey the lead characters undertake from Bangalore to Tajmahal on a cycle.Ambari is a 2009 Indian Kannada romantic film written and directed by A. P. Arjun, making his debut.

page72.title: Yaare Neenu Cheluve
page72.description: A woman loses her purse and her university certificates along with it, but a man finds them and mails them to her. They fall in love with each other through letters and phone calls.

page72.title: Topiwala
page72.description: Basak is a criminal mastermind, who gets away with major heists. Ramayana Raghu determines to catch him, who escapes the net each time. Meanwhile, a desperate politico will reveal his Swiss account secret code to a beggar, but not to his own son!

page72.title: Sri Krishnadevaraya
page72.description: Sri Krishnadevaraya is a 1970 Indian historical drama film in Kannada language, produced and directed by B. R. Panthulu. It stars Rajkumar as Krishnadevaraya, an emperor of the Vijayanagara Empire in the 16th century.

page72.title: Rambo
page72.description: The story is of a car salesman (Sharan) who does not work in a showroom but unscrupulously forces owners to sell their vehicles. He never owns a car himself but he lands himself in trouble over the car deals.

page72.title: Chandralekha
page72.description: People staying at a resort find terrifyingly eerie things happening around them. Several people decide to commit suicide at a remote resort.The film is remake of Telugu film Prema Katha Chitram (2013)

page72.title: Anna Bond
page72.description: Bond Ravi is a generous guy, who has the tendency of helping others. He is a karate champ who works in a medical camp of Singapore. He meets Meera on a bus and falls in love with her charm.

page73.title: Aakash
page73.description: Aakash is a young man who bears a lot of responsibilities over his shoulder. He works in various fields as a driving instructor, swimming trainer and video cameraman to earn his living and take care of his young sister.

page73.title: Sri Srinivasa Kalyana
page73.description: Sri Srinivasa Kalyana is 1974 Kannada mythological film directed by Vijay. The film which is based on lord Venkateswara, stars Rajkumar, B. Saroja Devi and Manjula in lead roles.

page73.title: Huliya Haalina Mevu
page73.description: Huliya Haalina Mevu is a 1979 Indian Kannada historical period drama film directed by Vijay, based on a novel of the same name by Bharathisutha, and starring Rajkumar as Chengumani, a commander-in-chief.

page73.title: Chingari
page73.description: Officer Parashuram travels to Switzerland to rescue his girlfriend. He only has five days to rescue his girlfriend from her kidnappers.

page73.title: Vaalee
page73.description: This film is a remake of Tamil movie Vaali.A man struggles to deny his attraction to his twin brother's new bride.

page73.title: Sevanthi Sevanthi
page73.description: A folk singer, Devu (Vijay) mistakes admiration for love from the village headmanâ€™s daughter Sevanti (Ramya). Obsessed with the idea of living with her forever, he prevents her marriage by tying the taali on the sly.

page74.title: Ranadheera
page74.description: Ranadheera is a 1988 Indian Kannada language musical action film starring V. Ravichandran and Kushboo in the lead roles. Directed by Ravichandran himself, the film was produced by his father N. Veeraswamy under Eshwari Productions.

page74.title: Raja Huli
page74.description: Raja Huli comes from an affluent family. He is a happy-go-lucky individual who spends happy life with his friends and family.One day when sets out to convey the love of his friend to a girl, he finds out that she is his ex-girlfriend.

page74.title: Ganda Hendathi
page74.description: A remake of Hindi hit film Murder (2004).Tragedy looms when an unhappily married woman  renews a steamy affair with a former lover from college.

page74.title: Anna Thangi
page74.description: It depicts the story of an elder brother's love and affection for a younger sister. The film, upon release, met with positive reviews and was remade into Telugu language with the title Gorintaku.

page74.title: Aryan
page74.description: An athletics coach falls in love with his female protÃ©gÃ© while battling challenges like hostility, betrayal, jealousy and lust.

page74.title: Gange Baare Thunge Baare
page74.description: Gange Baare Thunge Baare is a Kannada drama movie, directed by Sadhu Kokila. The cast of Gange Baare Thunge Baare includes Prajwal Devaraj,Sunaina / Anusha.

page76.title: Yaare Koogadali
page76.description: A remake of Tamil movie Porali, Yaare Koogadali is the story of how a boy is ill-treated by his family for land. The family needs the boy's signature to sell the land. Eventually, he takes on his relatives and teaches them a lesson.

page76.title: Shravani Subramanya
page76.description: Shravani is in love with Sudeep, but she finds out that he's rowdy. While escaping from his clutches, she is saved by Subramanya, a budding singer. To save Shravani from an unpleasant situation, Subbu pretends to be her husband for a day.

page76.title: Preethse Preethse (2009)
page76.description: Preethse Preethse revolves around Akash, a rich man who is in love with Aishwarya but is unable to express his love. He lives in an illusionary world and fantasises incidents that relates to his love with Aishwarya.

page76.title: Edegarike
page76.description: Contract killer Sona decides to leave his past behind. This unnerves his powerful don who orders him killed before he can surrender but things don't go according to plan.
6-5=2 tells the story of 6 friends who went on a trek but went missing one by one. Using the found footage style of filmmaking, it shows how only one of those six survived.

page76.title: Navagraha
page76.description: The story is about Jaggu (Darshan) who is known as the king pin of international thefts and smuggling and is known for his crafty mind and his ability to pull off with some really risky robberies.

page77.title: Ninnindale
page77.description: Ninnindale is a simple and sweet love story completely based in America. It`s about 2 people, Vicky and Pramila, who are NRIs in America. The film revolves around the friendship between Vicky, Pramila and their friends.

page77.title: Naanu Nanna Kanasu
page77.description: In this remake of the Tamil movie `Abiyum Naanum` Prakash Raj and Amoolya star in lead roles. The movie follows the story of a father-daughter relationship and how it matures along with the little girls.

page77.title: Mr. Garagasa
page77.description: Muniya wants his movie script to be made into a film, so he comes to Bangalore with the script in his briefcase. He finds Parthasarthy, a film producer, but Muniya has a hard time convincing Parthasarathy that his story is good enough.

page77.title: Bhagyada Lakshmi Baramma
page77.description: Pandu and Parvathi pretend to be married in order to win huge amount of money in a competition. Will they win?

page77.title: Beladingala Baale
page77.description: An anonymous, mysterious caller who claims to be a huge fan of Revanth, the Chess Grandmaster from India, challenges him in many ways. It results in an inner quest for him as he literally sets out to track down the elusive caller.

page77.title: Kanneshwara Rama
page77.description: Kanneshwara Rama is a 1977 Kannada political drama film directed by M. S. Sathyu and produced by the Sharadha Movie Productions banner. The film is based on the novel Kannayya Rama written by the acclaimed writer S. K. Nadig.

page78.title: Desi
page78.description: A 2006 Kannada Drama movie by Nikhil Manju starring: Mani, Ananya Kasaravalli, Doddanna

page78.title: Kasturi Nivasa
page78.description: The story of an extremely generous and righteous man, Ravi Varma, who succumbs to his intention of being generous no matter what happens.

page78.title: Pancharangi
page78.description: Lucky is a US-based software professional and an obedient son of his parents, so much to the fact that he does not have the courage to speak out that he already has a girlfriend.Bharath Kumar is the youngest son who is a carefree person.

page78.title: Chandavalliya Thota
page78.description: Chandavalliya Thota is a 1964 Indian Kannada language film directed by T. V. Singh Thakur, based on a novel of the same name written by T. R. Subba Rao. The film starred Rajkumar, Udaykumar and Jayanthi in lead roles.

page78.title: Bhookailasa
page78.description: Bhookalisa is a mythological drama movie that deals with greed and hatred. A bad king makes up his mind to invade a kingdom that is very dear to Indra the lord of heaven. Being scared of the plan the Indra asks for help. Several people with lots of plans get involved to save the kingdom of God.

page78.title: Mungaru Male
page78.description: Preetam falls in love at first sight with Nandini. The sweet romance set in the monsoons, boosted by good songs and music.It was the first film in India (for any language) to be screened continuously for over one year in a multiplex.

page79.title: Ranganayaki
page79.description: Ranganayaki is a 1981 Kannada film directed by Puttanna Kanagal starring Aarathi, Ambarish, Ramakrishna, Ashok, Rajanand. The film is an based on the novel Ranganayaki by Ashwattha.

page79.title: Kaviratna Kalidasa
page79.description: Kaviratna Kalidasa is a 1983 Kannada historical drama film based on the life of Kalidasa, a renowned Classical Sanskrit writer of 4th Century A.D., whose name was extremely popular across Indian sub-continent.

page79.title: Operation Diamond Racket
page79.description: Operation Diamond Racket is a 1978 Indian Kannada Spy Thriller film produced and directed by the duo B. Dorai Raj and S. K. Bhagavan, starring Rajkumar and Padmapriya in the lead roles.

page79.title: Navakoti Narayana
page79.description: Navakoti Narayana is a 1964 Indian Kannada film directed by S. K. Ananthachari starring Rajkumar and Sowcar Janaki in lead roles. The film is based on the life of Purandara Dasa, a prominent composer of Carnatic music who lived from 1484-1564.

page79.title: Nammoora Mandara Hoove
page79.description: Shivrajkumar visits his good friend and falls in love with the girl his friend loves.The film was considered a landmark in the career of its lead actors.

page79.title: Mussanje Maatu
page79.description: The film revolves around the life of a Radio Jockey, Pradeep (Sudeep), who runs a radio programme called "Mussange Maathu" for depressed people
